name: EAAccessory
desc: An object that contains information about a single, connected hardware accessory.

items.name: var delegate: EAAccessoryDelegate?
items.desc: The object that acts as the delegate of the accessory.

items.name: protocol EAAccessoryDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that defines an optional method for receiving notifications when the associated accessory object is disconnected.

items.name: var isConnected: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the accessory is currently connected to the iOS-based device.

items.name: var connectionID: Int
items.desc: The accessory’s unique ID for connecting to the iOS-based device.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The display name of the accessory.

items.name: var manufacturer: String
items.desc: The name of the accessory’s manufacturer.

items.name: var modelNumber: String
items.desc: The model information for the accessory.

items.name: var serialNumber: String
items.desc: The serial number of the accessory.

items.name: var firmwareRevision: String
items.desc: The current firmware version for the accessory.

items.name: var hardwareRevision: String
items.desc: The hardware version of the accessory.

items.name: var protocolStrings: [String]
items.desc: The communication protocols supported by the accessory.
